name: afrobarometer_langugages
title: The Afrobarometer Languages Dataset
description: This data links languages appearing in the Afrobarometer surveys to several language datasets: ISO 369-3, Glottolog, and the World Atlas of Language Structures (WALS).

sources.name: Afrobarometer Merged Round 5 data (34 countries) (2011-2013) (last update: July 2015)
Afrobarometer ISO 639-3 Complete Code Tables Set (2017-02-17)
The World Atlas of Language Structures Online

resources.name: countries
resources.title: Afrobarometer Countries
resources.description: Countries appearing in each Afrobarometer round, and associated ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 (2-letter) country codes. These ISO country codes are used in the other datasets because, unlike the country variables in the Afrobarometer surveys, they are standard across rounds.

fields.name: value
fields.title: Country value
fields.description: The integer value of the Afrobarometer country variable. See the `afrobarometer_variables` table for the name of the country variable in each Afrobarometer round.

fields.name: label
fields.title: Country label
fields.description: The label of the Afrobarometer country variable. See the `afrobarometer_variables` table for the name of the country variable in each Afrobarometer round.

fields.label: Country code
fields.description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code
fields.name: iso_alpha2

resources.name: language_variables
resources.description:
Names and information of language variables in the Afrobarometer survey.
This presents some of the information in `afrobarometer_languages` in a slightly different way.

fields.label: Language variable type
fields.description:
Language variable type.
- `respondent`: Respondent's home language. - `interview`: Interview language was conducted in. - `interviewer`: Interviewer's home language.
fields.name: type

fields.label: Variable name
fields.description: Name of the variable in the Afrobarometer dataset.
fields.name: variable

fields.label: "Other" variable
fields.description: Variable with the verbatim responses to the "Other" option.
fields.name: other

fields.label: Language name
fields.description: Language name. This is the string value as it appears in an Afrobarometer language variable.
fields.name: name

fields.label: Country code
fields.description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code
fields.name: country
iso_639_3
fields.label: ISO 639-3 codes
fields.description: One or more ISO 639-3 language codes for that language. If a macrolanguage, then at most one. There should be no missing values, instead special ISO 639-3 codes are used.

fields.name: glottocode
fields.label: Glottocode codes
fields.description: A Glottolog languoid identifier for the language. A (name, country) combination can match at most one Glottolog languoid, which can be a family, language, or dialect.

fields.name: wals
fields.label: WALS codes
fields.description: One or more language identifiers for languages in the World Atlas of Language Structures (WALS).
